<!-- Setup 02-dir.R -->
```{r setup-02-dir-r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```


<!-- Show all files -->
```{r show-all-files}
files <- dir(here("data/weather"), full.names = TRUE)
files
```


<!-- see also fs::dir_ls() -->
```{r see-also-fs-dir-ls}

```


<!-- Convert to tibble -->
```{r convert-to-tibble}
files_df <-
  files %>%
  enframe()

files_df
```


<!-- Remove the name column -->
```{r remove-the-name-column}
files_df_1 <-
  files %>%
  enframe(name = NULL)

files_df_1
```


<!-- Construct tibble from a vector -->
```{r construct-tibble-from-a-vector}
tibble(filename = files)
```


<!-- Extract a column as a vector -->
```{r extract-a-column-as-a-vector}
files_df %>%
  pull()
```


<!-- Extract a specific column as a vector -->
```{r extract-a-specific-column-as-a-vector}
files_df %>%
  pull(name)
```
